greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The 2-adic valuation of A318454(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: f[1] = 1; f[n_] := f[n] = 1/2 (Sum[Mod[d, 2], {d, Divisors[n]}] - Sum[f[d] f[n/d], {d, Divisors[n][[2 ;; -2]]}]);
program: (PARI) A318455(n) = valuation(A318454(n),2); \\ Needs also program from A318454.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_ and _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 29 2018
